snippet: More than 2.1 million people turned on the live Internet stream of Super Bowl XLVI on Sunday night, NBC said.
abstract: Record-setting 2.1 million people watch NBC's live Internet stream of Super Bowl XLVI; other NFL news noted.

byline.original: By BRIAN STELTER and RICHARD SANDOMIR

lead_paragraph: More than 2.1 million people turned on the live Internet stream of Super Bowl XLVI on Sunday night, NBC said.

headline.seo: Streaming of Super Bowl Sets Record
headline.main: Streaming of Super Bowl Sets Record
headline.print_headline: Streaming of Super Bowl Sets Record
